Description: COMES FURNISHED! Step into comfort and convenience at 230 Brookline St. This September 1st, a fully furnished three-bedroom, two-bath apartment awaits you. Modern furniture, spacious bedrooms, and a renovated kitchen with a charming brick wall accent. Washer and dryer in the basement, ample storage, and street parking available. Close to transportation and shops. Your ideal sanctuary is here. Contact us now for more information and secure your new home!
